extendedInfo.description: Google Play Movies & TV allows you to watch movies and TV shows purchased on Google Play.You can stream instantly on your Android phone or tablet, or download so you can watch from anywhere, even when youâre not connected. Also, get quick access to your personal video collection, including those taken on your phone or tablet.Learn more about Google Play Movies & TV at http://play.google.com/about/moviesNote: TV shows are currently available in the United States only.

reviews.title: Good just need more selection...
reviews.comment: Google still need better deals with the Film studios here in the UK, no MGM means no James Bond! Plus some films are still rental only and there are no TV series available to buy in the UK, come on Google I refuse to use iTunes! Update: As of 1st Aug 2013 TV shows are now available in the UK. Well done Google!
reviews.author: James Earley

reviews.title: It used to be amazing
reviews.comment: For some unknown reason, while Google was trying to streamline there app, they managed to remove the personal videos section. And the gallery app isn\'t the same, while the old play movies used to show by picture and title, the gallery only shows by picture. Please Google, bring back our personal videos section. I like my 64GB Micro SD, let me use it for what I want to!
reviews.author: Matthew LaShure

reviews.title: HTC One- Stock Version- android 4.2.2- error playing movies
reviews.comment: Since the update to android 4.2.2,  am not able to play any google play movie on my htc one.   HTC One- andorid 4.2.2 with sense 5
reviews.author: Akhilesh Chandra

reviews.title: Can\'t Watch Local/saved videos on Devices
reviews.comment: Why can\'t we watch our personal videos?  Used to be able to untill the update.   Would be nice to share my recorded videos of my kid via Chromecast to Family!
reviews.author: Jesse Hanson

reviews.comment: Very large issue with trying to pick up in the middle of a movie where I left off. Hell its an issue to even get a movie started even after trying their trouble shooting ideas.
reviews.author: Brice Anderson

reviews.title: Watch Movies All the Time on Google TV
reviews.comment: Last update fixed the buffering issues.  Works great on my Google TV now.
reviews.author: Chris Bigg

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: No issues. Not sure why people have so many complaints! New format is cleaner and who cares if personal video\'s are in menu option! At least they are there
reviews.author: Karen Brown

reviews.title: Where has the file name for personal videos gone?
reviews.comment: Plays my home made videos well, but need file name rather than just a jpeg graphic picture of the title, I cannot identify which file is which from a graphic! Using a Nexus 7 to watch compilations. Please allow me to choose my own views of files rather than follow the Apple route of controlling the users every activity!
reviews.author: Stephen Bertolla

reviews.title: Cool...i just love to have it
reviews.comment: Wow!!!!!! Coool ap
reviews.author: Krishna Prasad

reviews.title: Can\'t view personal videos
reviews.comment: What\'s odd is that anything that isn\'t a tv show or movie is left off this app, so you have to go to the gallery to view such things. It used to do so before the update, so taking off that feature is odd and questionable.
reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

reviews.title: Very limited app
reviews.comment: The very streamlined app feels like it isn\'t complete. The selection on Google play may be ok, but the prices certainly are not. Common sense says a digital copy should be cheaper than a physical one.
reviews.author: Michael Mikhalchuk

reviews.title: Waste of DATA.MONEY.TIME
reviews.comment: Hate having to uninstall reinstall to play a $15 barbie movie which then I have to DOWNLOAD AGAIN because offline it ALWAYS decides that it \"can t fetch license error - 1\" ??? KMN!!! APP SUCKS
reviews.author: Kidaivi Crichton

reviews.title: Bring back the personal videos section
reviews.comment: Yes I know personal videos can still be accessed through other means, but that\'s not really the point. It was very convenient to be able to access them through this app, and there\'s no reason to have removed that feature.
reviews.author: Anthony Macuk

reviews.title: No personal videos menu?  Boo
reviews.comment: Was really nice to be able to load my other movies into 1 app.  Oh well, back to factory.  Dummies.
reviews.author: James Elie

reviews.title: My portable TV
reviews.comment: The ability to watch my shows from G Play on my large screen Note II lets me watch wherever I go; the gym, coffee shop, waiting for the wife and girls to pick out clothes at the mall...
reviews.author: Adrian Belinne

reviews.title: Weak
reviews.comment: Google Play Movies & \"TV\" . Spent ages looking for TV shows. False advertising.  Also why can\'t I download movies to the SD card? You can do it on the samsung store.
reviews.author: Stephen Jessep

reviews.title: Using HTC One
reviews.comment: Just doesn\'t stream anything via 3G mobile? Always tries and tries then throws up a playback error... All other streaming from other sources work.
reviews.author: Brian Ferris

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Error 31!!!!!!  Try fixing this app!   Worthless. You owe me money.   Too many errors, HTC One T-Mo.  I don\'t understand why you can\'t fix it. Do you need some help?
reviews.author: Joe DeProspero

reviews.title: Colin Tait
reviews.comment: unable to view movies on HTC ONE thought this phone was the bees knees but not sure now?
reviews.author: Colin Tait

reviews.title: Allow external SD storage
reviews.comment: Otherwise this program remains bunk.  Vudu defaults all your downloaded content to your external SD.  Google has no reason not to allow you to do this.  I keep all my movies now in clouds etc.  I own two from Google and I\'m sorry I do.
reviews.author: Dan Auiler
